channel.title: Mc.banxsi.co.uk || www.banxsi.co.uk
channel.description:
CREATIVE WORLD // SURVIVAL WORLD // SURVIVAL GAMES
[PVP] [50 SLOTS] [FACTIONS] [MOB ARENAS] [ECONOMY] [SPLEEF] [JOBS]
[NO GRIEFING] [ADMIN/MOD SUPPORT] [RANKING SYSTEM]
Welcome to Banxsi's Server! We offer many features to appeal to all types of players, whether you're a Creative player or a Survival player. We have three main worlds: Creative, Survival and a Survival Games world. We have a friendly community of Players, Mods and Admins to help with all your needs.
We have a zero tolerance to griefing and we encourage the use of Factions to help prevent this occuring. PVP is enabled to provide a more interesting Survival experience.
